citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a copy of the medical records for the fifteen dogs available for inspection. The records are
currently being kept at another facility. Review of current medical records of dogs is required to verify routine preventative
care for the dogs, annual exam findings and appropriate treatment of any medical conditions or injuries.
The facility must keep copies of medical records for dogs and make them available for APHIS inspection. These records
must include information required in section 3.13 such as vaccinations, medical treatments/procedures and any findings
or test results.
Correct by 12/22/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(b) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility does not have a copy of the medical records for the fifteen dogs available for inspection. The records are 
currently being kept at another facility. Review of current medical records of dogs is required to verify routine preventative 
care for the dogs, annual exam findings and appropriate treatment of any medical conditions or injuries. 
The facility must keep copies of medical records for dogs and make them available for APHIS inspection. These records 
must include information required in section 3.13 such as vaccinations, medical treatments/procedures and any findings 
or test results. 
 
Correct by 12/22/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
